title: Unbearable
description: Grief.How do you survive the loss of a mother you thought didn't love you...until it was too late?Forgiveness.How do you forgive the person who hurt you the most?Fear.How do you survive the person who won’t let you go?Jealousy.How can your heart continue to trust the person you thought you knew?Betrayal.How many secrets are too many?Lust.How can you say no, when your body screams yes?Passion.How can you deny a love that has no boundaries?Slade and Samantha's story continues...Have you heard the great news???
